body: "The biggest Asian photography festival Chobi meal vi kicked off in Dhaka with a vow to fight against injustice around the world," informs photo-blogger Monirul Alam.
original_body: "The biggest Asian photography festival Chobi meal vi kicked off in Dhaka with a vow to fight against injustice around the world," informs photo-blogger Monirul Alam.
title: Bangladesh: Chobi Mela VI Started
